# Copilot AI Instructions

You are building Feature 002: AI Predictions.

Use:
- Gemini 2.5 Pro for analysis
- 2 RapidAPI keys with rotation
- Redis for rate limiting
- Supabase for backup
- SPECPULSE_METADATA in all plan/spec

Pattern:
- CLI: main.py
- Web: app.py
- Tests: test_*.py
- Cache fallback on rate limits
